name: Jaffa Exile
description:
The game was created in 36 hours during Global Game Jam 2017.

In the year 2038, an earthquake shattered the Holy Land. The city of Jaffa survived, but is now floating at sea and being constantly battered by huge waves and mutants. 

Build the city of Jaffa, defending it from mutants, and making sure it remains balanced and doesn't topple over. In this unique take on a tower defense the main goal is to stay afloat as long as possible and prevent the city from toppling over, by balancing the weight of it's buildings and shooting at mutants.

Android Version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TheSailors.JaffaExile

Game Jam Entry: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/jaffa-exile
